explanation: Funds are required to acquire software licenses needed for the Foundational Logistics Information Technology Enterprise System (FLITES). The FLITES program presently is in development and will replace a suite of legacy item management control systems. Software requirements for development of information technology systems are financed by Research, Development, Test and Evaluation (RDT&E), Air Force (RDT&E, AF) appropriations.

Funds for acquisition of software licenses for development of the Foundational Logistics Information Technology Enterprise System (FLITES) program were requested and appropriated in this line, and are available for transfer to RDT&E, AF, for proper execution.
